title: Why Us
description: Tixguru data analysis team has conducted thorough backtests to determine portfolio hyperparameters since 2017.
description_2: The rationale behind an index strategy is that we will focus on increasing market exposure and decreasing the costs of running such a system.
description_3: The CRIX (CRyptocurrency IndeX), BTC, ETH  are the benchmarks designed for the crypto market. The CRIX, BTC, ETH have been rescaled to begin at $1,000 and compared to the CAP fund for the same time period.
